alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay County through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 255 PM EDT/155 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Panama City Beach. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Bay, Laird, Pine Log and Seminole Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
